text: DGamer (Disney Gamer) was an online service made by Disney for use with games made by Disney Interactive Studios, the game company of Disney. It ran from 15 May 2008 to 13 March 2013, with the games from the service being on the Nintendo DS and PlayStation 3. The service was added by Disney Interactive.E3 '07: DGamer heads to DS It was started in North America on 15 May 2008, at the same day as the Nintendo DS game "The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian." The service was used for Disney games until 13 March 2013, when it was stopped. ==Supported games== *The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian *Spectrobes: Beyond the Portals *Hannah Montana 3 *Ultimate Band *The Cheetah Girls: Passport to Stardom *Disney Fairies: Tinker Bell *Phineas and Ferb *Club Penguin EPF ==References== == Other websites == *Official website Category:The Walt Disney Company
title: DGamer
